info.name: Instagram Full-res+Dark+Right-click
info.description:
Combined mew's dark with many fixes with full res images and enabled right click 

you can find skin that removes login requirement in profiles here: https://userstyles.org/styles/183329/instagram-removed-login-requirement
but with a recent change you can view pictures (without account) with the middle mouse button

in stories right click is accessible at the right edge of the video. https://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/164671_additional_35276.jpeg?r=1578231516

Non-Dark version here: https://userstyles.org/styles/166344/instagram-full-res-right-click

I don't actively use Instagram so report bugs or additions as comments
info.additionalInfo:
6/5/20
Remade from scratch:
 Added reactive design
 Fixed some theme bugs an even one instagram's
 Fixed some dark theme bugs
 Added back arrows in image previews
 Added dark theme in direct messages
 Moved removed login requirement in profiles to a different skin because it messes with scroll 
 behavior in pop-ups



16/3/20
Fixed dark theme on comments
Fixed video overflows and other minor fixes

5/1/20
added back left click in stories (right click is still accessible at the right edge of the video. https://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/164671_additional_35276.jpeg?r=1578231516)

14/11/19
Fixed: Pop-ups not working with removed login requirement

12/11/19
Fixed: Videos again...
Fixed: Black icons/logos
Added: Removed login requirement in profiles

26/9/19
Fixed: Play button and right click on videos
Fixed: White comment dots

10/4/19
Fixed: tall images being cropped
Fixed: direct image viewing

29/11/18
Fixed: Play button not being centered
Fixed: Play button obscuring right click

27/11/18
Fixed: UI in tall video previews
Fixed: tall videos being cut in direct links

21/11/18
Fixed: play button on videos and tags on photos
Added: right click to stories

data.title: Pause stories by Left Mouse Button down
